trans-unit.source: Provides data for several of the events that are associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Stylus" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per diversi eventi associati alla classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Stylus" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs> class provides data for the following events:
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs> classe fornisce i dati per gli eventi seguenti:

trans-unit.source: (as well as equivalent events declared on the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> class).
trans-unit.target: (nonché eventi equivalenti dichiarati nella <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> classe).

trans-unit.source: The stylus to associate with the event.
trans-unit.target: Stilo da associare all'evento.

trans-unit.source: The time when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Il tempo in cui si verifica l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> that the (<c>x</c>, <c>y</c>) coordinates are mapped to.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> a cui sono mappate le coordinate (<c>x</c>, <c>y</c>).

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la posizione dello stilo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> that represents the position of the stylus, based on the coordinates of <paramref name="relativeTo" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> che rappresenta la posizione dello stilo basata sulle coordinate di <paramref name="relativeTo" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects collected in the event.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> che contiene oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> raccolti nell'evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> to which the (<c>x,y</c>) coordinates in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> are mapped.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> a cui sono mappate le coordinate (<c>x,y</c>) in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects relative to the specified input element.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> che contiene oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> relativi all'elemento di input specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects collected in the event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> che contiene oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> raccolti nell'evento.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="relativeTo" /> is neither <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="relativeTo" /> non è né <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> né <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> to which the (<c>x,y</c>) coordinates in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> are mapped.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> a cui sono mappate le coordinate (<c>x,y</c>) in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> to be used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> che viene usato da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> that uses the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> and contains <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects relating to the specified input element.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> che utilizza l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> specificato e contiene oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> relativi all'elemento di input specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> that contains <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects collected during an event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> che contiene oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> raccolti durante un evento.

trans-unit.source: `subsetToReformatTo` must be compatible with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29> method.
trans-unit.target: `subsetToReformatTo` deve essere compatibile con il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> dal <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29> metodo.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> method to get a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%2CSystem.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription%29> method.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> metodo per ottenere un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> prima di chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%2CSystem.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription%29> metodo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%2A> uses constraints from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs>, even if the constraints in `subsetToReformatTo` are different.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%2A> utilizza vincoli dal <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs>, anche se i vincoli in `subsetToReformatTo` sono diversi.

trans-unit.source: For example, if `subsetToReformatTo` uses <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> values of 0 and 1023 but <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs> uses values of 0 and 255, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%2A> returns a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> containing the values 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se `subsetToReformatTo` Usa <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> valori pari a 0 e 1023 ma <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs> utilizza valori pari a 0 e 255, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%2A> restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> contenente i valori 0 e 255.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="relativeTo" /> is neither <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="relativeTo" /> non è né <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> né <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the stylus is in proximity to, but not touching, the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se lo stilo è in prossimità del digitalizzatore senza toccare.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the stylus is in proximity to, but not touching, the digitizer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se lo stilo è in prossimità del digitalizzatore senza toccare; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the stylus in inverted.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se lo stilo è invertito.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the stylus is inverted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se lo stilo è invertito; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: Gestore generico da chiamare nella modalità specifica del tipo.

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: Destinazione sulla quale chiamare il gestore.

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Richiama i gestori eventi in una modalità specifica del tipo, che può aumentare l'efficienza del sistema di eventi.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: Questa implementazione esegue il cast del gestore generico come un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventHandler> e quindi lo richiama.

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate su questo modello di implementazione e per i motivi, vedere <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> e [indirizzato Cenni preliminari sugli eventi](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice" /> that represents the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice" /> che rappresenta lo stilo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice" /> that represents the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice" /> che rappresenta lo stilo.
